entities.name: Brooklyn Entity Mirror

sensors.name: brooklyn.mirror.catalog_item_id
sensors.description: The catalog item id of the mirrored entity in the remote brooklyn

sensors.name: brooklyn.mirror.summary
sensors.description: The json map returned by the entity rest endpoint (ie the EntitySummary model)

config.name: brooklyn.mirror.entity_id
config.description: Brooklyn ID of the entity being mirrored

config.name: brooklyn.mirror.entity_url
config.description: URL for the entity in the remote Brooklyn mgmt endpoint

config.name: brooklyn.mirror.poll_period
config.description: Frequency to poll for client sensors

config.name: brooklynnode.managementUser
config.description: The user for logging into the brooklyn web-console (also used for health-checks)

entities.description: Provides an entity which can sit in one brooklyn domain and reflect the status of an entity via the REST API of another domain.
